title: DDD by Night
eventShortDescription:
From those guys that brought you DDD Melbourne comes a free pre-conference evening to get you warmed up for DDD Melbourne 6.

The evening will be hosted by Alex Mackey & Lars Klint (but don't let that put you off) & consist of 10 short & sharp presentations of around five minutes in length on a dev related subject.

Our friends from Xero in Hawthorn have kindly donated us some space to hold this and DDD Melbourne will be providing beer, soft drink and pizza.
